text: ohu ahasda, bhūmiyada, utpādanaya kara tibīmehida, rātriya hā dahavala māruven māruvaṭa pæmiṇīmehida, minisunṭa prayōjanayak at kara dīma magin sāgarayanhi yātrā karana nævhida, (karkaśaka vī) mærī giya bhūmiyaṭa paṇa dīmaṭa (saśrīka kirīmaṭa) allāh ahasin væsīmaṭa salasvana varṣāvada, siyalūma vargayē satunda bhūmiyehi visirī siṭīmada, suḷan̆ga vividha diśāvanṭa (harava) haravā yævīmehida, ahasaṭa hā bhūmiyaṭa atara pālanaya karanu læba æti ghana valākuḷehida, (minisunṭa æti phala prayōjana gæna paryēṣaṇaya kara) sitana janatāvaṭa (ohugē dayāvada, ādarayada dænum denu labana anēka) sādhakayan niyata vaśayenma ættēya
